medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient noticed a firm, walnut-sized, painless mass on the top of his head two months before admission, which enlarged slightly over the next couple of months.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had previously been told he had borderline hypertension, but he was otherwise well and took no medications. No other past medical conditions were mentioned.
medical_history.family_history: There was no history of cancer in his parents or siblings.
medical_history.social_history: The patient worked full-time as a computer design engineer, was married with no children, and there were no specific lifestyle factors mentioned.
